title: The Rise of Axie Infinity | Jeff 'Jiho' Zirlin (SotN 7/13)
description:
Axie Infinity has exploded into the mainstream in 2021. Is it just a game? Is it an economy? What does Play-to-Earn mean?

Join David and Ryan as they explore the world of Axie Infinity!
